mapper.update: update EVALUATIONRESULT set a1 = #{a1}, a2 = #{a2}, a3 = #{a3}, a4 = #{a4}, a5 = #{a5}, a6 = #{a6}, evalcheck ='Y' where opennum = #{opennum} and sid = #{sid}
mapper.select: select a.${a2}, nvl(b.cnt,0) as cnt from ( select ${a2} as ${a2}, count(${a2}) as cnt from EVALUATIONRESULT where opennum = ${opennum} group by ${a2}) b, ( select level as ${a2},0 as cnt from dual connect by level <=5) a where a.${a2} = b.${a2}(+) order by a.${a2}

select a.lyear, a.term, b.lnum, a.dividenum, b.lname, c.pname, d.a1
from lecture a, lecture_info b, professor c, evaluationresult d where a.opennum = d.opennum and b.lnum = #{lnum} and a.pid = b.pid and a.pid = c.pid and b.pid = c.pid ORDER BY A.LYEAR DESC, A.TERM DESC
